title: Responsible LLM Deployment for High-Stake Decisions by Decentralized Technologies and Human-AI Interactions
summary: High-stakes decision domains are increasingly exploring the potential of Large Language Models (LLMs) for complex decision-making tasks. However, LLM deployment in real-world settings presents challenges in data security, evaluation of its capabilities outside controlled environments, and accountability attribution in the event of adversarial decisions.
